Instruction: Mix eggs in a large mixing bowl until foamy. Gradually blend in flour and salt to form a soft dough. Roll out the dough thinly, about 1/8 inch, and cut into strips measuring 2 inches by 5 inches. Create a cut along the center of each strip, then twist to form a loop where one end passes through the slit.
The recipe has the full ingredients needed to make a classic apple pie. Once baked, the warm, sweet aroma will fill your home and satisfy your taste buds.
